Articles.Content:
When I first started using CKAN it was working fine. Now whenever I try to install a mod, it comes up with the error of:

Failed to download "https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/424/ScienceAlert/download/1.8.9" - error: An exception occurred during a WebClient request.

Regardless of the mod, it has the same error every time. I uninstalled KSP and re-downloaded CKAN, still does not work. Tried running CKAN as admin, didn't work.
